avatarDescription: View somebody's avatar in full size.

avatarExtended.extendedHelp: As this command's name says, it shows somebody's avatar.
explainedUsage: The user to get the avatar for. Defaults to you yourself.
avatarExtended.reminder: Use the --size flag to change the avatar's size.

avatarNone: The user does not have an avatar set.

colorExtended.extendedHelp: The color command displays a set of colours with nearest tones given a difference between 1 and 255.
explainedUsage: The color to check. Can be in the RGB, HSL, B10 (Base 10) or HEX format.
A numeric difference between each shade of the color. Defaults to 10. If you don't know what this is, then you probably don't need it.

contentExtended.extendedHelp: Raw content will help you better copy-paste message content as you will not have to reproduce all the formatting.
explainedUsage: The channel in which the message is to get the content from. Defaults to the current channel
ID of the message to get the content from.

countryExtended.extendedHelp: This command uses https://restcountries.eu to get information on the provided country.

createEmojiDescription: Adds a custom emoji to your Discord server.

createEmojiExtended.extendedHelp: Using a custom emoji on another server, I can re-upload that emoji to the current server.
createEmojiExtended.reminder: Make sure the bot has {{MANAGE_EMOJIS, permissions}} permissions in this server!

createEmojiInvalidDiscordEmoji: I could not resolve `{{parameter}}` to a valid Discord emoji. Make sure it is from a Discord server, and not a default emoji.
defineDescription: Check the definition of a word.

explainedUsage: The word or phrase you want to get the definition from.

defineNotfound: I could not find a definition for this word.

duckDuckGoExtended.extendedHelp: This uses the alternative search enginge DuckDuckGo to search the web
duckDuckGoExtended.reminder: If you want to search google use `Skyra, google`

duckDuckGoNotfound: I am sorry, but DuckDuckGo API returned a blank response. Try again with different keywords.
duckDuckGoUnknownError: I am sorry, but DuckDuckGo API replied me with a message I can't understand...

emojiExtended.extendedHelp: I'll give you the emoji name, whether it is a custom emoji or not, the emoji ID and a large image preview of the emoji.
explainedUsage: The emoji to get information about
emojiExtended.reminder: It doesn't matter whether I share a server with a custom emoji or not!

emojiInvalid: The argument you provided is not a valid emoji.
emojiTooLarge: '{{emoji}}' is so heavy the hamsters couldn't keep with its size. Maybe try one that is smaller?
emotesDescription: Shows all custom emotes available on this server

emotesExtended.extendedHelp: This will first list all the non-animated emojis, and after that all the animated emojis.
emotesExtended.reminder: The list of emotes is split per 50 emotes

eshopDescription: Request information for any American Nintendo Digital Store

eshopExtended.extendedHelp: This command queries Nintendo of America to show data for the game you request.
explainedUsage: The name of the game you're looking for.

eshopTitles.noCategories: This game has not been sorted into any categories

horoscopeExtended.extendedHelp: Gets the horoscope for a given sun sign from Kelli Fox's The Astrologer.
explainedUsage: The sun sign you want to get the horoscope for
If you want to get the horoscope of another day you can specify that Defaults to "today".

horoscopeInvalidSunsign: I was not able to resolve `{{parameter}}` to a valid sign, maybe try `{{maybe}}`?
igdbDescription: Searches IGDB (Internet Game Database) for your favourite games

igdbExtended.extendedHelp: This command queries the IGDB API to show data on your favourite games.
explainedUsage: The name of the game to look up

itunesDescription: Searches iTunes API for music tracks

itunesExtended.extendedHelp: This command queries the Apple iTunes API to show data on a music you request.
explainedUsage: The name of the song to look up

moviesExtended.extendedHelp:
This command queries TheMovieDatabase API for data on your favourite movies.
Tip: You can use the 'y:' filter to narrow your results by year. Example: "star wars y:1977".
explainedUsage: The name of the movie to look up
examples: Star Wars Revenge of the Sith

explainedUsage: The options to poll. Minimum of 2, maximum of 20
examples: Make an anime channel, Make a gaming channel, Make a serious-discussion channel

pollReactionLimit: Please don't add emojis while I am reacting!
priceCurrencyNotFound: There was an error, please make sure you specified an appropriate coin and currency.
priceDescription: Convert between currencies with this command.

priceExtended.extendedHelp: Convert between any two currencies, even if they are cryptocurrencies.
explainedUsage: The amount to convert. Default is 1.
The currency to convert to, you can give multiple currencies to get results in each.

quoteExtended.extendedHelp: Quotes also include the message's image, if any
explainedUsage: The channel in which the message is to quote. Defaults to the current channel
ID of the message to quote.

showsDescription: Searches The Movie Database for any show

showsExtended.extendedHelp: This command queries TheMovieDatabase for data on your favorite shows
explainedUsage: The name of the show to search

topInvitesDescription: Shows the top 10 most used invites for this server

topInvitesExtended.extendedHelp: Use this to get some server insights if your server doesn't have access to Discord's official server insights.

topInvitesNoInvites: There are no invites, or none of them have been used!
urbanDescription: Check the definition of a word on UrbanDictionary.

explainedUsage: The word or phrase you want to get the definition for.
The page you wish to read. Defaults to 1.

urbanNoDefinition: There are no definitions for the query `{{parameter}}`!

whoisExtended.extendedHelp: Gets information on any server member. Also known as `userinfo` in many other bots.
explainedUsage: The user to get information about. Defaults to you yourself.

wikipediaExtended.extendedHelp: In NSFW channels I will also add the page image, if available. This restriction is in place because Wikipedia has NSFW images for NSFW pages as they have to be accurate (i.e. diseases or human body parts).
wikipediaExtended.reminder: Most Wikipedia page titles are case sensitive. Some celebrities will have lowercase redirects, but not many.

wikipediaNotfound: I am sorry, I could not find something that could match your input in Wikipedia.

youtubeExtended.extendedHelp: If I have the {{MANAGE_MESSAGES, permissions}} {{ADD_REACTIONS, permissions}} permissions then I will provide the option to navigate through the top 10 results.
explainedUsage: The video(s) to look up through YouTube

youtubeNotfound: I am sorry, I could not find something that could match your input in YouTube.
